title: College Or Not?
description: Jay Pencha's senior year is off to a rough start, and he’s not sure what he wants to do with his life. When fate throws Jay's middle-class family into turmoil, he has no choice but to question everything.Armed with nothing but courage and a nerdy best friend, Jay is off on an college visits, scouting out startups, making money, rubbing elbows with CEO’s, and (like always) trying to get Ella to notice him.He’s going to find his path in life, or blaze one heck of a trail trying.
author: Chad Grills
